title: Why are bronzies so STUPID?
body:
Finally got around to doing my prelims on my smurf.
Had at least 3 games with people intentionally feeding or throwing.

Still hit silver 3.
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/1990413#profile

So i've been playing around 4 years, just before pantheon was released. I played premades mostly while levelling and mained adc as tris is a hypercarry and free when you 'like' their fb page.

I made zero attempts to reduce toxicity, that was intentional so i could test Riots' theory that toxicity equates to poor performance ingame.

I actually noticed verbal harassment was usually the result OF toxic play. People very rarely spoke out in a toxic manner to say, bignote themselves after making a kill or after winning a team fight.

They very frequently however, abused people who were 'split pushing' and feeding while the enemy is just pounding them 4v5 in team fights.

And so i get to my point; After going into ranked and hitting high silver / low gold for 3 seasons, i transferred when it was free and somehow bugged out. I got slammed into B5 and have had a few series to silver and been b2/b1 quite a number of times.

But i keep dropping down because frankly, bronze people are intellectual cripples. There is just no polite way of saying this.

-ADC's whinge about supports 'stealing' cs when they wouldn't have gotten the last hit anyway. ADC's are easily the most toxic thing in bronze, they repeatedly demand their sup doesn't cs when they can't possibly hope to get a full 210 cs by 20 minutes. In fact the average is 70 so that's 140 minions dying and nobody gets their gold unless you buy specific sup items. Even then you're only getting 5% of it.

-Bronzies can't seem to understand simple maths. They keep diving into 'team fights' three-versus-five. They keep defending this tactic too, as if they aren't taught in grade 1 or preschool that 5 is greater than 3 and they shouldn't be doing it.

-Nobody knows their champ roles. I see teemos who don't split push and try to join team fights while unstealthed. I see shacos farming THEIR OWN jungle 24/7 and other junglers never ganking or getting dragon.

It's legitimately gotten to a point where I feel I HAVE TO create this post and ask the community in general,

What in the hell are you doing? There is a metric ASSTONNE of stupidity in bronze, why does nobody use their heads in this godforsaken bracket?
